subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The second-tier teams at the Rugby World Cup are playing some games just four days apart, which one team doctor says is about half the time needed to recover from the beating of the previous match.
snippet: The second-tier teams at the Rugby World Cup are playing some games just four days apart, which one team doctor says is about half the time needed to recover from the beating of the previous match.
